alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 18 at 6:32PM CDT until March 22 at 2:42PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Marengo and Hale Counties. .Flooding continues on the Black Warrior River and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by Saturday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING EARLY TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to early Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 90.0 feet, Pasture and wood lands begin to flood. Livestock should be moved to higher ground at stages above 90 feet. At 94.0 feet, Some secondary roads in the area begin to flood. Flooding of farm and pasture lands continues. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 87.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 92.7 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 90.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
